DOC.brief_title: QUARTO-II Study Evaluate Management Patients Resynchronized With QuartetTM LV Quadripolar Lead
DOC.detailed_description: Patient enrol study Informed Consent signature CRT-D+quadripolar ( QuartetTM ) LV lead .
DOC.criteria: Patient implant CRTD device QuartetTM quadripolar lead St. Jude Medical leave ventricle . Patient echocardiographic study perform 1 month prior implant End Systolic Volume Left Ventricle ( LVESV ) measure Patients grant informed consent . Patients 18 year . Patients previously resynchronized . Patients aortic stenosis aortic valve prosthesis Patients may potentially pregnant . Patients life expectancy < 12 month . Patients attend monitor visit establish protocol .
